Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Theme in C major, KV Anh. 38/383c

c. 1782 · KV1,2 Anh. 38 · KV3 383d · KV6 383c

[IMSLP]

This piece, which is incomplete, might also be for an organ without pedals.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/26 · BA 4525-01 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Kurt von Fischer
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5746 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Kurt von Fischer

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5
